analysis_period.description: Analysis period covers 60 months of prices, yielding 59 months of returns (January 2021 to November 2025)

data_sources.market_indices: MSCI country indices via iShares ETFs (EWG, EWQ, EWI, EWP, EWD, EWL, EWU)
data_sources.risk_free_rates: Country-specific 3-month government bond yields (ECB, FRED, Yahoo Finance)

main_findings.interpretation: Beta does not explain cross-sectional variation in returns

notes: Complete analysis addressing all assignment requirements. Includes market-cap weighted betas, portfolio optimization, value effects, and portfolio recommendations.
